name: Ice breaker
description: Questions to break the ice and start a conversation.

entries.name: What's something you're really passionate about?
If you could have any superpower, what would it be?
What's the best book you've read recently?
What's your favorite type of cuisine?
If you could visit any country in the world, where would you go?
What's your favorite hobby?
If you could have dinner with any historical figure, who would it be?
What's the most memorable trip you've ever taken?
What's your favorite movie and why?
If you could switch lives with any fictional character, who would it be?
What's the most interesting thing you've learned recently?
If you could learn any skill, what would it be?
What's your favorite outdoor activity?
If you could only eat one food for the rest of your life, what would it be?
What's your favorite thing to do on a lazy day?
If you could have any job in the world, what would it be?
What's the best concert you've ever been to?
If you could time travel to any period in history, which would you choose?
What's your favorite thing about your hometown?
What's the best gift you've ever received?
If you could have any animal as a pet, what would it be?
What's your favorite board game or card game?
If you could have any car, which would you choose?
What's your favorite type of music?
If you could live in any fictional world, which would you choose?
